verses.name: 2 Chronicles 34:4
verses.text: And they brake down the altars of Baalim in his presence; and the images, that were on high above them, he cut down; and the groves, and the carved images, and the molten images, he brake in pieces, and made dust of them, and strowed it upon the graves of them that had sacrificed unto them.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 34:5
verses.text: And he burnt the bones of the priests upon their altars, and cleansed Judah and Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 34:6
verses.text: And so did he in the cities of Manasseh, and Ephraim, and Simeon, even unto Naphtali, with their mattocks round about.
